wrote:
> We're not far from doing this, it has been done,
> Karl Sims did it in 
> 1994. See

http://web.genarts.com/karl/evolved-virtual-creatures.html

Ah, yeah.  I had heard of Sims work, but hadn't really
read much about it.  You're right, it is cool.  But as
far as the morphology and behavior of his evolved
agents, they're still very simple...I guess my point
is that this is possibly one of those open-ended
domains Ken was talking about.

Derek
